title: End Times
description:
Every human soul exists as a book that contains their life's story. Joel Christmas lives a double life, where the author of his story, who lives in heaven (The Fast Realm), and the proofreader, who lives on earth (The Slow Realm), struggle to get on the same page. The 7 spine binders, who represent the chakras, hold the book of life together. In order to become a self-actualized human, Joel must master all 7 of them, all while struggling with an existential crisis.

https://www.wappinanimation.com/poster.png <- Chart that serves at a blueprint for the world I'm creating. Please take a look. It is in my humble opinion, the best cosmological chart ever made.
It is also available for purchase as a poster here: https://www.etsy.com/listing/1578047590/12-universal-energies-metaphysical

It's been well over a year since I wrote this first chapter, but much more is in the works. The depth and scope of the world I'm building has expanded to a degree I never imagined, and I'm learning a lot about how I believe our universe actually is in the process. Thank you for reading!

https://docs.google.com/document/d/15qROsUQKbcqoRbNXPGlG5Q9kj9VfHUR73ZrkvdIWpVs/
https://www.youtube.com/@RWappin/playlists
author: Ryan Krzak
